sentences.english: So, dear young people, please speak up for peace.
sentences.chinese: 所以，亲爱的青年朋友，请为和平仗义执言。

sentences.english: Only this sturdy person dared speak boldly to uphold justice, may be able to affect people.
sentences.chinese: 只有这位坚强的人敢仗义执言，也许能感动人民。

sentences.english: You need also to be clear of your own motives in speaking to your friend.
sentences.chinese: 同时你还要弄清自己仗义执言的动机。
